# jsoncpp import
set(JSONCPP_WITH_TESTS OFF)
set(JSONCPP_WITH_POST_BUILD_UNITTEST OFF)
set(JSONCPP_WITH_WARNING_AS_ERROR OFF)
set(JSONCPP_WITH_STRICT_ISO OFF)
set(JSONCPP_WITH_PKGCONFIG_SUPPORT OFF)
set(JSONCPP_WITH_CMAKE_PACKAGE OFF)
set(JSONCPP_WITH_EXAMPLE OFF)
set(BUILD_SHARED_LIBS OFF)
set(BUILD_OBJECT_LIBS OFF)
set(BUILD_STATIC_LIBS ON)
add_subdirectory($ENV{JSONCPP_PATH} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/jsoncpp EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)

# googletest import
set(GOOGLETEST_VERSION $ENV{GOOGLE_TEST_VERSION})
add_subdirectory($ENV{GOOGLE_TEST_PATH}/googletest ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/googletest EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)
